blocks.name: eigrei
blocks.content: A necessary and sufficient condition (that holds when ` T ` is a Hermitian operator) for an eigenvalue ` B ` to be real. Generalization of Equation 1.30 of [Hughes] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wcel(c1, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, cc)
} = {
  syl6bbr(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, csm, c1)), wne(c1, c0v)), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c1)), wcel(c2, cr), wceq(cfv(ccj, c2), c2))

  mp3an(wceq(co(c1, csp, co(c2, csm, c1)), co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, co(c1, csp, c1))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c1, chba))
  his5(c2, c1, c1)
  syl6eq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c1), co(c2, cmul, co(c1, csp, c1)), co(co(c2, csm, c1), csp, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, csm, c1)))

  ax-his3(c2, c1, c1)

  hicli(c1, c1)

  mpan(wne(c1, c0v), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, csp, c1)), wcel(c1, chba))

  cjcli(c2)
